org.anarres.qemu.exec

Class QEmuDeviceOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.qemu.exec.AbstractQEmuOption
      • org.anarres.qemu.exec.QEmuDeviceOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QEmuOption
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QEmuDeviceOption.Isa, QEmuDeviceOption.Pci

    public class QEmuDeviceOption
extends AbstractQEmuOption
    A device frontend, exposed to the guest operating system. To list the device types supported by your QEmu installation, run qemu -device help. To list the properties of a device, run qemu -device <devicetype>,help.
    See Also:
    QEmuDevice
